Name: Turk-A-Lurk
About the game: A 2D Metroidvania Adventure! Explore a large open world featuring 5 unique biomes. Over 100 collectables to find and colorful characters to meet on your journey. Fight and conquer multiple bosses. Unlock powerful items allowing new areas to be reached! It will take some effort to save the farmer and release the magic back into the world, are you up to the challenge? If story mode isn't your cup of tea then you can compete in 20+ timed bonus levels with leaderboards to test your platforming skills in! These levels are significantly harder than the main storyline and may take some practice! More bonus content will be developed to keep the game expanding and updated! Full original soundtrack. World Map View. 50 achievements. Quick respawning system. Highscore leaderboards. Additional bonus level support in the coming months. Indie developed game. Hand pixeled art.
